title: 31 All-Inclusive Resorts and Hotels in Jamaica
text:
All-Inclusive Resorts and Hotels in Jamaica Where to pay one price for rooms, dining, and activities in Jamaica Sign Up for our Free Newsletters Thanks, You're in! Updated Articles and Resources Jamaica is home to more all-inclusive resorts than any island in the Caribbean apart from the Dominican Republic , from budget properties like the FDR resorts to the tony Breezes Grand Resort and Spa. There are about 30 pay-one-price resorts in all, situated in major resort areas like Montego Bay , Negril , and Ocho Rios . Some cater to families, some to couples only, and some -- like the Hedonism resorts -- to the naughty at heart. My comprehensive guide will help you choose the Jamaican all-inclusive that best suits your needs... Philip Coblentz/Photodisc/Getty Images Family friendly all-inclusive resort features a pool with corkscrew waterslide, banana-boat rides, and an X-Box gaming center. Adults will enjoy the excellent dive program, tennis, the pools, and dining at a choice of Caribbean, Italian, Tex-Mex, and barbecue eateries. More » Pool at Beaches Negril. © Beaches Resorts 
The classic Jamaica all-inclusive beachfront resort sits amid 20 acres of gardens and offers a choice of five restaurants, comprehensive water sports, beach and pools, and the Pirates Island waterpark. More » Seashore Bay Beach Resort. 
Another Negril resort , this smaller all-inclusive was formerly the Beaches Sandy Bay . It has two pools, three restaurants, and a kids' club. More » Hot tub at Grand Lido Negril resort in Jamaica. © SuperClubs 
The Jewel Runaway Bay features one-bedroom suites and verandah suites with private plunge pools, two new restaurants, a spa and dive center in a quiet setting on Jamaica's north coast. More » Memories White Sand Beach Resort, Jamaica. © Blue Diamond Resorts • Memories White Sand Beach Resort 
Previously the Breezes Trelawny , the Memories White Sand Beach Resort is located on Jamaica's northwest coast and boasts four pools -- including one for adults only and a kids' pool with waterslide -- and a wide range of inclusive activities including golf, tennis, water sports, parasailing, rock-climbing, and more. More » Couples Negril. © Couples Resorts • Couples Negril Couples Negril may be located in Jamaica, but the resort evokes a South Seas ambiance, especially in its open-air lobby. Dining options include traditional Jamaican and Mediterranean restaurants, and the property includes a series of natural pools crossed by pedestrian bridges. Part of the Couples Secret Rendezvous complex that includes Couples Tower Isle, Couples Sans Souci, Couples Swept Away, and Couples Negril. More » Couples San Souci Hibiscus Cottage jacuzzi. © Couples Resorts • Couples San Souci 
Carefree romance defines Couples San Souci , a 150-room property with a fine Italian restaurant, six bars, and Charlie's Spa, named for a resident sea turtle and providing treatments that incorporate mineral waters drawn from the resort's own spring. The resort is located in Ocho Rios. Part of the Couples Secret Rendezvous complex that includes Couples Tower Isle, Couples Sans Souci, Couples Swept Away, and Couples Negril . More » Oasis spa at Couples Swept Away. © Couples Resorts • Couples Swept Away 
Located in Negril, Couples Swept Away is a private, beachfront all-suites resort featuring a Thai restaurant, the gourmet Feathers dining room, and a 10-acre sports and fitness complex that includes a gym and spa, and unlimited golf for guests. Part of the Couples Secret Rendezvous complex that includes Couples Tower Isle , Couples Sans Souci , Couples Swept Away, and Couples Negril. More » Couples Tower Isle resort in Ocho Rios, Jamaica. © Couples Resorts • Couples Tower Isle Couples Tower Isle (formerly Couples Ocho Rios ) was Jamaica's first all-inclusive, couples-only resort, featuring 206 rooms and suites, five restaurants, a clothing-optional private island, a gourmet French restaurant, and activities like tennis, horseback riding, and a variety of classes and organized activities. Part of the Couples Secret Rendezvous complex that includes Couples Tower Isle, Couples Sans Souci, Couples Swept Away, and Couples Negril. More » Previous
